players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
Alice was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "I am the detective. I investigated Diana last night — Diana is the mafioso. Vote Diana."
You: "I don't trust quick claims without proof. Charlie, why did you wait to reveal and not share HOW you investigated? Diana, respond — anything to show you're not mafia."
Diana: "That claim is clearly convenient and sudden. Charlie, why reveal only now and expect us to blindly follow?"
Charlie: "Vote Diana — I investigated Diana last night and my result is the only way to stop the mafia now."

You: "I find Charlie's repeated, insistent claim suspicious — sudden detective reveals can be faked to steer votes. Diana, you seemed defensive but that could be town pressure. We need more than accusations: Charlie, what exact method/timing did you use to investigate? Diana, do you have an alibi or any reason Charlie's claim is impossible?"

Diana: "I agree with Bob — Charlie's claim is sudden and lacks detail. If you really investigated, tell us who you investigated (time) and how you confirmed the result. Rushing to vote on one name without specifics is risky."
Votes: Bob voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Bob
Diana was arrested
